overview:
Ankit Chhajer is an entrepreneur and currently the co-founder of Cheeni Labs.

Cheeni Labs is a startup, based out of Chennai - India, that is set out to create finely crafted products for the Indian market solving Indian specific problems. Their product komparify.com is a price comparison engine for telecom services. The mobile plan comparison is supported by a mobile application - Planhound - that calculates the number of calls made, SMS sent & data used and recommends the best-plan using the 3gsimplified engine with-in a single click.

Prior to starting Cheeni Labs, Ankit worked with the UBS Investment Bank, Stamford - North America. He holds a Masters in Computer Science from The State University of New York, Buffalo.
